instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00840 20v jumps between 0.011 to 0.020A
threads.message: After ssd replace board 20v no power and not turning on. where to start ?

threads.title: 820-00840 20v jumps between 0.011 to 0.020A
threads.message:
Same behavior without SSD?
Do you get 3V3_S5/SUS?

threads.title: 820-00840 20v jumps between 0.011 to 0.020A
threads.message:
Check for knocked off components.
No other reason, if machine worked good before...

threads.title: 820-00840 20v jumps between 0.011 to 0.020A
threads.message: everything seems good, no knocked off components

threads.title: 820-00840 20v jumps between 0.011 to 0.020A
threads.message:
Check diode mode to ground on SSD power lines; w/ and w/o SSD connected.
Compare with good board.

threads.title: 820-00840 20v jumps between 0.011 to 0.020A
threads.message: everything seems same with diode mode. when i pulled u7800 up, board stays 20v 0.020a

threads.title: 820-00840 20v jumps between 0.011 to 0.020A
threads.message:
Board cannot start without PMIC.
There should be induced damage, by wrong manipulation.
Was the battery disconnected?
